summary: A man who serves in the war between the forces of Light and Dark comes into possession of a device that can restore life to Moscow, which was nearly destroyed by an apocalyptic event.
cast: Konstantin Khabenskiy|Mariya Poroshina|Vladimir Menshov|Galina Tyunina|Viktor Verzhbitskiy|Zhanna Friske|Dmitriy Martynov|Valeriy Zolotukhin|Aleksey Chadov|Nurzhuman Ikhtymbaev|Aleksey Maklakov|Aleksandr Samoylenko|Yuriy Kutsenko|Irina Yakovleva|Georgiy Dronov|Nikolay Olyalin|Rimma Markova|Anna Slyu|Igor Lifanov|Sergey Trofimov|Mariya Mironova|Anna Dubrovskaya|Sergei Ovchinnikov|Anton Stepanenko|Emir Baygazin|Ekaterina Malikova|Elena Molchenko|Aleksandr Shvetsov|Gani Kulzhanov|Sergey Seryy|Shukhrat Irgashev|Igor Burlov|Olga Stukalova|Lyudmila Dolgorukova|Valentin Bukin|Kazbek Salpagarov|Andrey Barshchevskiy|Amir Alpiev|Vladimir Sterzhakov|Sazhida Tashmatova|Valentina Berezutskaya|Denizbek Chalapinov|Viktoriya Zimenkova|Irina Domninskaya|Romuald Makarenko|Aleksey Ogurtsov|Sergey Bystritskiy|Anna Kharlamova|Alexander Kasyanov|Alisher Murzakulov|Igor Savochkin|Sofiya Prigara|Elena Simonova|Mikhail Tikhomirov|Marina Stolyarova|Andrey Kuchishkin|Mikhail Gavrilov|Yuriy Yanushkin|Oleg Kshumanyov|Natalya Kuchishkina|Marat Yusupov|Aleksey Mitrofanov|Roman Miryaev|Maria Arbatova|Anne Brochet|Pierre-Christian Brochet|Pavel Khrulyov|Mariya Kiselyova|Sergey Lukyanenko|Boris Moiseev|Aleksey Neklyudov|Roman Radov|Nikas Safronov|Vasiliy Shandybin|Sergey Shnurov|Stepan Starchikov|Villi Tokarev|Yuliya Tokareva|Sergey Trofimov|Artemiy Troitskiy|Anita Tsoy|Anton Volovik|Leonid Yarmolnik
title: Guardianes del día
